client_profile_secondary_school_name: Istituto Tecnico Commerciale Statale Luigi Einaudi Torino
client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM met Lotti Martini Fantini during a business conference in Madrid. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Lotti Martini Fantini is a 39 year old Portfolio Manager from Spain.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
client_description_Family_Background: Lotti Martini Fantini and Emma have been married since 2021. They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Lotti received his secondary school diploma from Istituto Tecnico Commerciale Statale Luigi Einaudi Torino in 2004.
He then attended Ca' Foscari University of Venice, which he graduated in 2008.
Moreover he completed his extra university education at University of Naples Federico II in 2014.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Lotti Martini Fantini is a 39 year old and comes from Spain.
Lotti Martini Fantini launched his career as a Financial Advisor at Bankia S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 2010 to 2011.
In 2013, he moved to CaixaBank S.A. to work as a Portfolio Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 130000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has villa located in Barcelona, worth 2040000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 6050000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Neurosurgeon, in 2016.
client_description_Client_Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
